post.body: Trade you some brownies for a couple of muffins. I'm making fudge next. If I wasn't so old, you'd think I was PMSing.
Isn't this the time to tell your boss you have an emergency at home and have to leave immediately?
I've got my butter and eggs out so they can get to room temp. Going to bake all day.
and now they are going to provide guidance to GM and Chrysler. Those companies were screwed before, now they will be effed.
They are known as the Umbilical Bros. Check out: http://tinyurl.com/3oq88j
Pink donuts? I don't think so. Just give me a good old maple bar.
Would you be serving donuts with those martinis? or are they better with a red wine?
I do too Gretel. I also like the "Upside Down Show". I watch them with my grandson.
Are you in charge of refreshments as @vibistry inspires his followers with his 11,000 char thoughts broken into 140 char segments?
Do you get "snow days", or do you have to go to work when it's snowing?
Congratulations to you and @love2cookpie! That is definitely a handsome baby.
If there is a contest for Holiday Avatars.....YOU WIN!
He discovered the peanut butter candy. There are only two left, but I still have the rum balls.
No...I just hid the ones that were left. Your dad doesn't need them.
If you stop by....I have a few more for you plus some rum balls.
Just make sure it's a newspaper that you have read.
Sheesh....I've heard of starting early, but writing Christmas cards now. You are doing them for next year.....right?
Wishing you the best for 2009!
Yes, you count! Now we can all say we have made a New Year's resolution.
In 2000, I resolved to quit. This year, I'm resolving not to smoke.
I nominate @saxdiva for a Shorty Award in #music because she's a sax diva!
Nominate her for a shorty in happiness!
I nominate @saxdiva for a Shorty Award in #music because she plays a mean sax!
You are one of the most upbeat people on Twitter. Thank you for your positive slant on things.
LB. butter, LB. of choc chips, 6 oz. of unsweetened choc. melting in the double boiler. On my way to a BIG batch of brownies.
DH is off to be Santa at PetsMart for Springer Spaniel Rescue. I got to curl Santa's beard with a hot curling iron. Talk about trusting.
Sheesh...it is 50 degrees outside. If it were any colder, we might as well go to Las Vegas. Do they still have snow on the ground?
Some folks don't deserve to be parents......why would you name a child "Adolf Hitler"?
What should I give a nice, friendly, efficient mailman for Christmas?
That lady in Arkansas had her 18th child. That's a lot of Christmas shopping.
Mmmm, first cup of coffee is so good. If I had a maple iced donut, it would be perfect.
Is Joy Behar really a comedian? How come she isn't funny?
Note to self: Put more than a date on packages for the freezer. Is it meat sauce for spaghetti or Sloppy Joes? Do we need rolls or pasta?
Is this the "bad hair" year for political candidates? Who colored Richardson's hair? They belong in the same prison as Blago's barber.
The folks on the east coast always get such an early start. Since we west coasters can't catch up.....why not take a break?
So sad for John Travolta and his wife.
Damn, it's cold. How can we convince people to move here, buy foreclosures and pay taxes to get us out of debt, if it doesn't warm up.
The dog is tired of grilled hamburger patties. DH is going to get him barbecued leg quarters at the market. They're his favorite.
I'm resolving not to smoke in 2009. Anyone care to join me in my resolution?
We are off to go watch the floats for the Rose Parade head for Pasadena. They should be heading down Huntington Drive soon.
